metadata.title: CVE-2021-27022 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was discovered in bolt-server and ace where running a task with sensitive parameters results in those sensitive parameters being logged when they should not be. This issue only affects SSH/WinRM nodes (inventory service nodes).

criterions.comment: puppet package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
